code: import React from'react';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import'./LanguageSwitcher.scss';import flagIconUS from'../../assets/images/royaume-uni.png';import flagIconFR from'../../assets/images/france.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LanguageSwitcher=()=>{const{i18n}=useTranslation();const handleLanguageChange=language=>{i18n.changeLanguage(language);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"language-switcher",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleLanguageChange('en'),className:"language-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:flagIconUS,alt:"English Flag",className:"flag-icon"})," English"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleLanguageChange('fr'),className:"language-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:flagIconFR,alt:"French Flag",className:"flag-icon"})," Fran\xE7ais"]})]});};export default LanguageSwitcher;
